New Delhi: Almost 70 per cent of ‘low-risk’ Covid-19 patients have impairment in one or more organs four months after initial symptoms of SARS-CoV-2 infection, according to a new study from the UK.

articles.author: Miyoung Kim, Roxanne Liu
articles.title: Sinovac's COVID-19 vaccine induces quick immune response - study - Reuters India
articles.description: Sinovac Biotech's <SVA.O> experimental COVID-19 vaccine CoronaVac triggered a quick immune response but the level of antibodies produced was lower than in people who had recovered from the disease, preliminary trial results showed on Wednesday.
